resources.string: coz everyone follow their first love of life.\nshort and simple

This is a Cube Puzzle. In which you have to solve the cube so that each face has blue color. 
 As a precondition, you will get a puzzle board having 6 random blue squares.
 
If you roll the cube on to a blue square, the blue square is picked up on one face of the cube and if you roll a blue face of the cube on to a non-blue square, the blueness is put down again. 


Enjoy!!!!

Notes 
* Slide to move the Cube. 
#Restart the app to troubleshoot any prob.
Please go through \" How to Play \"
\nWrite your own story,\nelse you will be a part of other\'s story.
